comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: Please focus on non-federal buildings in your photostream - there are obviously thousands of photos of the Capitol on Flickr ... DCPL's images of neighborhood buildings and events will be much more unique, helpful, and interesting as uploads. Happy to see new additions here either way, though :)
